resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Forgets to set buffer time between appointments". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.
